name: world
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_news.
Tool description: Provide real-time news and articles sourced from Google News.
API description: This endpoint is used to get world news from Google News. The optional parameter that can be used is "lr" to determine the region

lr.description: The language and regional code to filter news, e.g., 'en-US'. Defaults to 'en-US'.
